notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: JYW, PLL, ZYT, PL, and XD conceived and designed the study; JYW, PLL, and QL analyzed and interpreted the data; JYW, PLL, CH, WR, and XD wrote the manuscript; CWL, XH, SJW, DS, CXD, LSH, ZSL, MHZ, LJZ, YLW, XMC, and SXG provided the study materials or patients; QL, YXL, ZWJ, and DMC performed the experiments. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
